name: outer place
description:
outer place

outer place is an experimental environment made for 7DFPS 2020. it was produced in 10 days by myself and sorgen in the Godot engine. we hope you like it!

CONTROLS
  • wasd to move
  • space to jump
  • left click to interact
  • tab to orbit
  • f to fullscreen
CREDITS

sounds acquired by sorgen and from freesound.org users

  • tim.kahn
  • ahriik
  • d00121058
  • alexbird
  • lwdickens

Heightmap Terrain plugin for Godot by Zylann

font used is Comfortaa by Johan Aakerlund
